Full solid surface. Used this for calendar picker, input-filed, toasts, panel-rectangles. Can also be used when layering surfaces one to another. For details, find "UI Layering" : 
https://www.figma.com/file/GAPJbRR46eugOlrHzFJ7Fe/UI-Layering?node-id=3%3A22089
